jokes: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because the light attracts bugs.
There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because he didn’t know how to ‘null’ his feelings.
Why did the programmer go broke? Because he lost his domain in a bet.
Why did the developer go broke? Because he couldn't find a way to monetize his app.
quotes: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before. — Bill Gates
Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute. — Harold Abelson
Talk is cheap. Show me the code. — Linus Torvalds
The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit. — Anonymous
The best error message is the one that never shows up. — Thomas Fuchs
motivational: Don’t worry about the bug you’re stuck on today. Future You will thank you for the solution you’ll discover.
Keep pushing. Every line of code is a step closer to mastery.
The key to success is consistency, and you’re well on your way!
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful. — Albert Schweitzer
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. — Steve Jobs
facts: The first computer virus was created in 1986. It was called Brain.
There are over 700 programming languages in existence.
The first 1GB hard drive, released in 1980, weighed over 500 pounds.
The first computer mouse was made of wood.
The first computer programmer was a woman named Ada Lovelace.
The first computer bug was a real bug! In 1947, a moth caused a malfunction in the Harvard Mark II computer.
The longest word you can type using only the top row of a QWERTY keyboard is 'typewriter'.
The first computer mouse was invented by Douglas Engelbart in 1964 and was made of wood.
The first computer programmer was a woman named Ada Lovelace, who wrote the first algorithm for Charles Babbage's Analytical Engine in the 1840s.
The first computer virus was created in 1986 and was called Brain. It was created by two Pakistani brothers.
The first computer game was created in 1962 and was called Spacewar! It was developed by Steve Russell at MIT.
The first computer hard drive was invented in 1956 and could store only 5 megabytes of data.
The first computer mouse was called the 'X-Y Position Indicator for a Display System' and was invented by Douglas Engelbart.
The first computer bug was a real bug! In 1947, a moth caused a malfunction in the Harvard Mark II computer.
The first computer virus was created in 1986 and was called Brain. It was created by two Pakistani brothers.
inspire: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. — Steve Jobs
Stay hungry, stay foolish. — Steve Jobs
The best way to predict the future is to invent it. — Alan Kay
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful. — Albert Schweitzer
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. — Steve Jobs
Believe you can and you're halfway there. — Theodore Roosevelt
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. — Eleanor Roosevelt
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. — Sam Levenson
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. — Franklin D. Roosevelt
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. — Winston Churchill
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today. — H. Jackson Brown Jr.
The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday. — Matty Mullins

fortune: Your code will compile successfully... after you debug that one hidden issue!
Today’s the day you finally solve that annoying bug that’s been haunting you for days.
In the near future, you will write code so efficient that your past self will feel jealous.
A sudden burst of inspiration will lead you to an elegant and innovative solution.
Your debugging skills will be praised by your colleagues and become the stuff of legends.
A rare and elusive bug will reveal itself to you, allowing you to fix it effortlessly.
Your code will run flawlessly, impressing both users and fellow developers alike.
An unexpected breakthrough will revolutionize the way you approach programming.
Your code will be recognized and celebrated as a masterpiece of software engineering.
A serendipitous encounter with a new technology will open up exciting possibilities for your projects.
Your programming skills will be in high demand, leading to exciting career opportunities.
You will find the perfect balance between simplicity and complexity in your code.
Your code will inspire others to write clean and elegant solutions.
A challenging problem will ignite your problem-solving skills and lead to a brilliant solution.
Your code will be the foundation for a successful and widely-used software application.
You will discover a new programming language that will greatly enhance your development skills.
compliment: You're like a human compiler—fast, efficient, and nearly flawless!

Your smile can light up any room.
You have a heart of gold and a beautiful soul.
Your kindness and compassion make the world a better place.
You have an amazing sense of style and always look fabulous.
Your positive energy is contagious and brightens everyone's day.
You have a unique and captivating personality that draws people in.
You're a true inspiration to those around you.
Your creativity knows no bounds and constantly amazes others.
You have a natural talent for making people feel valued and appreciated.
Your laughter is infectious and brings joy to everyone who hears it.
You have a remarkable ability to find beauty in the simplest things.
Your determination and perseverance are truly admirable.
You have a gift for making people feel heard and understood.
Your presence brings a sense of calm and tranquility to any situation.
You have a brilliant mind and a knack for solving complex problems.
Your generosity and selflessness are truly inspiring.
You have a magnetic personality that draws others towards you.
